name: Dragscope
description:
In DragScope, you control a sniper who has to shoot down enemy soldiers in a Middle Eastern city, while time runs out.  Be careful! civilians are also nearby, so you will be penalized if you shoot one of them.

However, sometimes, things are not what they seem...

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Use the mouse and the left click to aim and shoot respectively. If you shoot a civilan, the timer will have 3 seconds subtracted.
